projects.title: Grid Explorer
projects.description: Grid Explorer - Intelligent Robot Design and Programming (CS270) at KAIST. This project aims to implement the Grid Explorer, an intelligent robot designed to detect obstacles and red regions on a 4x6 map.

aboutpara: As a dedicated software engineer and student at KAIST, I am thrilled to share my passion for technology and my commitment to excellence. With a strong foundation in computer science and a genuine love for software development, I am eager to contribute my skills and knowledge to make a significant impact in the industry and academia.
